categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Vnas was a battle in the early Galactic Civil War which was waged at the planet Duro. Having tried to free the planet from Imperial rule, the Rebel Alliance was defeated. Even so, the BTL Y-wing starfighters would still make a substantial contribution, making victory hard-earned for the Empire. Duro would be liberated from the Empire only years after the Battle of Endor.
